description: You might be familiar with Patrick Rouge, the uber-sexual gymnast who's been working with us for over a year now, but we know you've never seen Chad Clovis, a young PE teacher who decided that getting into porn on the side would add some much needed spice in to his life.Chad wanted to help out on the ranch we were shooting at, so we gave him the keys to the tractor and put him to work. When he and Patrick Rouge were wrapping up their tasks, they decided to head in for a shower.It only took a few seconds of these two being naked together before they were making out, groping and rimming each other. Not wanting to get too dirty while trying to get clean, Chad and Patrick took a stroll out to the hammock where the real fun begins. Chad stuffs his thick cock into his buddy's ass, giving it to Patrick hard enough to make him cum twice. Once Chad knows he's done his job, he unloads his man milk onto Pat's back and calls it a day.We love hot, young guys who still know how to put in a full day's work!Enjoy.
title: Chad Clovis & Patrick Rouge
